alert.note: Alert for Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:41PM CDT until May 12 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Grady County in central Oklahoma... West central McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 341 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Agawam, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blanchard, Dibble, Washington, Cole, Alex, Bridge Creek, Middleberg, Tabler, Agawam, and Ninnekah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
